original_text: When Solomon had finished all these prayers and supplications to the Lord, he rose from before the altar of the Lord, where he had been kneeling with his hands spread out toward heaven.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 무릎을 꿇고 손을 펴서 하늘을 향하여 이 기도와 간구로 여호와께 아뢰기를 마치고 여호와의 제단 앞에서 일어나

sentences.original_text: When Solomon had finished all these prayers
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬이 이 모든 기도를 마쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: he rose from before the altar of the Lord
with his hands spread out toward heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 두 손을 하늘을 향해 펼치고
